name: igfeed-proxy
description: A cached proxy application based on Instagram Basic Display API

IGFP_DOMAIN.description: Target domain on which this application will live

IGFP_CORS_ORIGINS.description: Allowed URL for CORS API requests

IGFP_PROTOCOL.description: Either HTTP or HTTPS, (leave default HTTPS)

IGFP_MEDIA_FIELDS.description: GraphQL specification of field to retrieve for media fetching

IGFP_MEDIA_REFRESH_DELAY.description: Delay between Instagram media cache invalidation

IGFP_SCOPES.description: List of OAuth scope to authorize for Instagram API usage

IGFP_TOKEN_REFRESH_DELAY.description: Delay for long lived API token invalidation
